item.title: Coding Fusion!
item.description: R and Python: 2 Worlds Collide I realize that the title and subtitle for this page may make it seem like we are gonna do something insanely cool, but it will just be a quick demonstration with some simple reticulate shenanigans. Let’s start with our first component: R. Below you’ll see me load up the reticulate package and save a variable as “Da”. library(reticulate) Da<-"LESSS" Now for our second component: Python.
